translated: This is the jewel-protection pledge of the jewel-protection abode, the Ratnādhara mudra itself, the two-mouths posture.

original: nor bu 'dzin rtse mche ba yin //
analyzed: nor bu 'dzin rtse mche ba yin //
translated: The jewel-holding tip is the fangs.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni rin chen char 'bebs ma'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bskum la mche ba bzhin du khar 'jog pa 'di ni nor bu gnod sbyin gyi gnas su nor bu mche ba gtsigs ma'i'o //

translated: This is the jewel-fanged pledge of the jewel-yakṣa abode, the Ratnadāyaka mudra with the two index fingers bent and placed in the mouth like fangs.

original: dbus su mnyam pa @141b khu tshur ro //
analyzed: dbus su mnyam pa @141b khu tshur ro //
translated: The equal fist in the center.

original: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'i dbus su mdzub mo gnyis dang / rang gi mthe bo gnyis kha sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyi gnas su nor bu dam tshig khu tshur 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'i dbus su mdzub mo gnyis dang / rang gi mthe bo gnyis kha sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyi gnas su nor bu dam tshig khu tshur 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: This is the great jewel pledge fist mudra, which is the jewel pledge fist mudra in the abode of the jewel fist, with the two middle fingers and the two thumbs joined together.

original: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid 'dir phyag rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid 'dir phyag rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: The jewel dancer and so on up to the jewel rain mudra are the pledge mudras explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarva­rūpa­kāma­siddhi, which here become the great mudras.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po las bshad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po las bshad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes te /
translated: Then, after the explanation of the great mudras, there is the knowledge of the pledge mudras.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid nges par bslab cing bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid nges par bslab cing bstan par bya'o //
translated: One should definitely learn and teach the characteristics of binding the pledge mudras.

original: phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid //
translated: Those very great mudras

original: snyim sbyar byas te bcings nas ni //
analyzed: snyim sbyar byas te bcings nas ni //

original: zhes bya ba la thal mo sbyar la mthe bo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis brkyang mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas rin po che lta bur byas pa'i phyag rgya dpral bar gzhag pa 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la thal mo sbyar la mthe bo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis brkyang mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas rin po che lta bur byas pa'i phyag rgya dpral bar gzhag pa 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //

original: thal mo sbyar ba mthe bo gnyis bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas pa 'di ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang 'di yin no //🔽snyim pa sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis kyi gdong sbyar nas gung mo gnyis nor bu 'dra bar byas pa phyag rgya dpral bar gzhag pa 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o //

translated: The great vajra jewel pledge mudra is formed by joining the palms together, crossing the two thumbs, and making the two index fingers into a jewel. translated: Joining the cupped hands, with two index fingers and two ring fingers in lotus form, and the two middle fingers in the form of a jewel, this is the jewel samādhi lotus.

original: nor bu ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya nyid las mthe'u chung sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni gtong ba dam tshig ma'i'o //🔽nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid las ral gris gcod pa'i tshul du sbyor ba 'di ni nor bu dam tshig gi ral gri ma'i'o //

analyzed: nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor ba 'di ni nor bu dam tshig gi 'khor lo ma'i'o //
translated: From the very mudrā of the jewel samādhi lotus, turning it like a firebrand wheel, this is the wheel of the jewel pledge.

analyzed: nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha nas 'dren par byed pa /
translated: From the very mudrā of the jewel samādhi lotus, drawing it out from the mouth in the manner of expelling speech,

original: 'di ni nor bu gsung ba mchog ma'i'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nor bu gsung ba mchog ma'i'o //
translated: this is the supreme speech of the jewel.

original: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar brtan par byas la mthe bo gnyis gshibs te /
analyzed: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar brtan par byas la mthe bo gnyis gshibs te /
translated: Joining the cupped palms, the two middle fingers are made firm like sprouts, and the two thumbs are placed side by side.

original: mdzub mo'i rtse mo dang sbyar nas rin po cher byas la mthe bo dang gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mthe'u chung gi sor mo rnams brkyang ste sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo nor bu'i gzugs su bsams te /
analyzed: mdzub mo'i rtse mo dang sbyar nas rin po cher byas la mthe bo dang gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mthe'u chung gi sor mo rnams brkyang ste sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo nor bu'i gzugs su bsams te /
translated: The tips of the two index fingers are joined to form a jewel, and the thumb, ring finger, and little finger are extended, all the finger tips imagined in the form of a jewel.

original: rin po che char 'bebs ma'i lha mo bsgom pa 'di ni rin chen @142b char rgyun ma'i'o //
analyzed: rin po che char 'bebs ma'i lha mo bsgom pa 'di ni rin chen @142b char rgyun ma'i'o //
translated: This meditation on the goddess Ratnamegha is the seal of Ratnānada.

original: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya nyid mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gar gyi spyor bas ston pa ni nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
analyzed: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya nyid mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gar gyi spyor bas ston pa ni nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
translated: The seal of Ratnānada itself, displayed by the performance of a dance like a whirling firebrand, is the pledge of jewel worship.

original: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya nyid gnyis su byas nas snying gar 'dzin pa ni nor bu dam tshig bsrung ba ma'i'o //
analyzed: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya nyid gnyis su byas nas snying gar 'dzin pa ni nor bu dam tshig bsrung ba ma'i'o //
translated: The seal of Ratnānada itself, made double and held at the heart, is the pledge of jewel protection.

original: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bskum ste mtshe ba bzhin du khar 'jog pa 'di ni nor bu mche ba gtsigs pa ma'i'o //
analyzed: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bskum ste mtshe ba bzhin du khar 'jog pa 'di ni nor bu mche ba gtsigs pa ma'i'o //
translated: The mudra of Ratnāmburāśi, with the two index fingers bent and placed in the mouth like fangs, is the mudra of Ratnāṅkuśā.

original: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'i dbus su mdzub mo gnyis dang rang gi mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mor sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni nor bu dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'i dbus su mdzub mo gnyis dang rang gi mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mor sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni nor bu dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra of Ratnāmburāśi, with the two index fingers and one’s two thumbs touching at the tips, is the pledge seal of the Ratnavyūharāja dhāraṇī.

original: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin chen 'debs pa'i gzungs kyi mthar thug pa rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin chen 'debs pa'i gzungs kyi mthar thug pa rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The pledge seals of Ratnālaṃkāra and so forth up to Ratnaspharaṇadhāraṇī should be understood as the pledge seals explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarvārthasiddhi.

original: mdor bsdus gsang ba'i gsang ba ste //
analyzed: mdor bsdus gsang ba'i gsang ba ste //
translated: The secret of the secret in brief

translated: is the bestower of the four powers.

original: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba ste /

analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni gsang ba'i gsang ba'o //

analyzed: mdor bsdus nas phyi rol gyi bya ba la mi ltos pa bsgom pa gtso bor gyur pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //

analyzed: sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bas na dngos grub ster ba'o ;

original: / des byin gyis brlabs pa ni dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i bya ba gang gis de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi bdag nyid
analyzed: / des byin gyis brlabs pa ni dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i bya ba gang gis de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi bdag nyid
translated: “Empowered by that” is the samādhi that focuses on that, which is endowed with the ability to generate the maṇḍala.

original: kyi rigs dam pa 'di zhes bya ba blo la gnas pa gsungs @144b shing bshad pa'o //
analyzed: kyi rigs dam pa 'di zhes bya ba blo la gnas pa gsungs @144b shing bshad pa'o //
translated: Having entered into that samādhi, which is called by that name, he taught and explained this sublime mantra of his own lineage.

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes don thams cad grub pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang / rdo rje snying pos rin chen lta ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang / rdo rje spyan gyis rin chen padma'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes don thams cad grub pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang / rdo rje snying pos rin chen lta ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang / rdo rje spyan gyis rin chen padma'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang /
translated: Then, in order to emanate the Dharma maṇḍala of all-accomplishing vajra, Vajragarbha in order to emanate the Dharma maṇḍala of the jewel-viewing, Vajranetra in order to emanate the Dharma maṇḍala of the jewel lotus,

original: rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rin chen char 'bebs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di rnams gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rin chen char 'bebs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di rnams gsungs so //
translated: and Vajraviśva in order to emanate the Dharma maṇḍala of the jewel rain, they each taught this sublime mantra of their own lineage.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che las chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che las chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul nas /
translated: Then the Lord, having emanated the Dharma maṇḍala from the jewel at his heart,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snga ma bzhin yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snga ma bzhin yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: should be understood to say to all the tathāgatas, “It is just as before.”

original: de la de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: de la de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
translated: Therein, beginning with “Then again the Lord,”

original: aom sarbba aa bhi she ka dzny'a na h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: aom sarbba aa bhi she ka dzny'a na h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: up to “Oṃ sarva-abhiṣeka-jñāna hūṃ,” this much text teaches the second samādhi called the “supreme king of maṇḍalas of the Dharma maṇḍala of the great jewel family.”

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Then, beginning with “Then, as before, the gathering, consecration, and so forth,” up to the end of the chapter, one should understand that it teaches the third samādhi called the “supreme king of activities of the Dharma maṇḍala of the jewel family.”

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The meaning of the text from “Then the Bodhisattva Mahasattva Akasagarbha” explains that the attainments taught in the great maṇḍala of Sarvapavitra should be accomplished by those who have obtained the sacred commitments and empowerment in the maṇḍala of Sarvapavitra.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis slob dpon dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis slob dpon dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Then, the extensive ritual for the master and disciple to enter is taught by the text beginning with “Then the Bodhisattva Mahasattva Akasagarbha.”

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The word “then” is as before.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'o //
translated: “This” is what is in the mind.

original: rang gi rigs ni nor bu chen po'i rigs so //
analyzed: rang gi rigs ni nor bu chen po'i rigs so //
translated: “One’s own family” is the great jewel family.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor te de gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor te de gsungs pa'o //
translated: The “wisdom maṇḍala” is the dharma-mudra maṇḍala, which is taught.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'i don brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'i don brjod pa ste /
translated: The word “then” expresses the meaning of immediately after.

original: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: immediately after the prior service.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is the teaching:

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i rdal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings @145a * //
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i rdal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings @145a * //
translated: Having performed the yoga of all-success as explained in the great maṇḍala of all-success, and having performed the great yoga as explained therein, later, having bound the great seal of the Blessed One all-success as explained in the Dharma maṇḍala,

original: te ; / snga ma bzhin du sna'i rtse mor 'chad bar 'gyur ba'i don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho gas chos kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: te ; / snga ma bzhin du sna'i rtse mor 'chad bar 'gyur ba'i don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho gas chos kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
translated: as before, at the tip of the nose, one should meditate on the Dharma wheel by the rite explained in the maṇḍala of the four seals of all-success.

original: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo las bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa'i phyir zhes bya bas zhag bdun chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo las bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa'i phyir zhes bya bas zhag bdun chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, for the sake of meditating on the three kinds of meditative concentration explained in the Dharma wheel, for seven days one should meditate on the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: de nas de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then, after that, this maṇḍala should be drawn.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ston pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ston pa ste /
translated: the explanation of the reason is:

original: gang gi phyir chos kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba de lta bas na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba de lta bas na /
translated: because without entering the mandala of the Dharma, the realm of sentient beings to be disciplined will not attain the desired powers.

original: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
translated: Therefore,

original: ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
analyzed: ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
translated: then, the supreme mandala of wisdom🔽is explained.

original: zhes bya'o // rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la //
translated: Like the vajra realm,

original: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: it is like the emanation mandala of the Dharma.

original: rin chen ye shes zhes bshad do //
analyzed: rin chen ye shes zhes bshad do //
translated: The wisdom jewel is explained.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
translated: In the manner of the great mandala,

original: zhes bya ba la don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyings su'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyings su'o //
translated: in the realm of the great mandala of the accomplishment of all aims.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
translated: All mandalas are measured with string.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyi rol dang nang bzhin du 'di'i yang phyi rol dang nang gi dkyil 'khor bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyi rol dang nang bzhin du 'di'i yang phyi rol dang nang gi dkyil 'khor bya'o //
translated: Like the outer and inner of that, here too there is an outer and inner mandala.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bris pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bri bar bya'o zhes de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bris pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bri bar bya'o zhes de ltar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In the great maṇḍala of all accomplishments, just as Vairocana and so forth are drawn, so here also one should draw.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
translated: The supreme dharma maṇḍala

original: snying ga'i mtshan ma bri bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i mtshan ma bri bar bya // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: should draw the heart sign.

original: 'di ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
analyzed: 'di ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
translated: Thus, in the Vajradhātu Dharma Maṇḍala, above the moon maṇḍala,

original: rdo rje rtse lnga ba de'i lte bar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga ba de'i lte bar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: a five-pronged vajra is drawn. In its center, the Bhagavān Vairocana and so forth up to the excellent eon are seated in vajra posture.

original: rang gi mtshan ma nas 'bras tsam gyi snying ga'i phyi rol du bsnams nas rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan ma nas 'bras tsam gyi snying ga'i phyi rol du bsnams nas rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te /
translated: One should draw the heart sign, the size of a grain, outside the heart, hold it, and place it on the vajra binding,

original: skyil mo krung gi steng du gzhag pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: skyil mo krung gi steng du gzhag pa de bzhin du 'dir yang bri bar bya'o //
translated: on top of the crossed legs, just as it is drawn here.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po ni 'di rnams so zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin te /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po ni 'di rnams so zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin te /
translated: Then, The essence of the gnosis of this maṇḍala is these means that the essence of the gnosis of Vairocana and so forth is these.

original: ye shes kyi snying po de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i gzugs su bzhugs pa de dag bsgrubs pas las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sngags yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes kyi snying po de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i gzugs su bzhugs pa de dag bsgrubs pas las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i sngags yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The essence of gnosis is the form of the sound that teaches that, and by accomplishing that, it is the mantra that accomplishes all activities.

original: @145b 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: @145b 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa ghi she ka dzny'a na au tta ma h'um /
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa ghi she ka dzny'a na au tta ma h'um /
translated: Oṃ sarvatathāgata-aghiṣeka-jñānāuttara-maṃ hūṃ.

original: zhes bya ba'i sdugs 'dis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste gzugs brnyan la gzhug pa'am /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sdugs 'dis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste gzugs brnyan la gzhug pa'am /
translated: By this mantra, Vairocana and so forth are brought down from the sky and placed in the image,

original: yang na 'dis bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dis bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o //
translated: or the Bhagavān is drawn with this.

original: aom badzra ma ni h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra ma ni h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-maṇi hūṃ.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu chen mo'i'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu chen mo'i'o //
translated: This is for the great vajra jewel.

original: aom badzra ratna aam ku ra h'um zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen myu gu ma'i'o //🔽aom badzra badzra ratna padma h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra ratna aam ku ra h'um zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen myu gu ma'i'o // aom badzra badzra ratna padma h'um /
translated: The mantra Om vajra ratna amkuja hum is for Vajraratna-amkuja.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen padma'i'o //🔽aom badzra ratna barsha h'um /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen padma'i'o // aom badzra ratna barsha h'um /
translated: The mantra Om vajra vajra ratna padma hum is for Vajraratna-padma.

original: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //🔽aom sarbba aartha siddhi dzny'a na h'um /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o // aom sarbba aartha siddhi dzny'a na h'um /
translated: The mantra Om vajra ratna varsha hum is for Ratnavairsini.

original: zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i'o //🔽aom ma ni dzny'a na h'um /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i'o // aom ma ni dzny'a na h'um /
translated: The mantra Om sarvartha siddhi jnana hum is for Sarvarthasiddhi.

original: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i mtshan ma'i'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i mtshan ma'i'o //
translated: The mantra Om mani jnana hum is for the jewel sign.

original: aom ma ni tsint'a aam ku sha zhes bya ba ni rin chen rgyal po ste /🔽de nas brtsams nas /🔽aom ma ni dzny'a na mu shi h'um /
analyzed: aom ma ni tsint'a aam ku sha zhes bya ba ni rin chen rgyal po ste / de nas brtsams nas / aom ma ni dzny'a na mu shi h'um /
translated: The mantra Om mani cinta amkuja is for Ratnaraja.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar du bris la nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste rang gi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du bris la nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste rang gi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Then, beginning with that, one should write up to Om mani jnana mushti hum, and having brought it down from the sky, one should place it in one's own direction.

original: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin chen char 'bebs ma'i bar gyi sngags kyis gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin chen char 'bebs ma'i bar gyi sngags kyis gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should arrange the goddesses of the great maṇḍala of Sarvārthasiddhi, beginning with Ratnatārā and ending with Ratnavajrā, with their mantras.

original: de'i rjes la bskal pa bzang po rnams ni rang gi rig pas so //
analyzed: de'i rjes la bskal pa bzang po rnams ni rang gi rig pas so //
translated: Then, the Bhadrakalpa Buddhas should be arranged with their own vidyā mantras.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin byas nas zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / rang gi cho ga rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin byas nas zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / rang gi cho ga rjes su spyad la /
translated: Then, having performed the extensive rite in this maṇḍala just as it is,

original: slob dpon gyis rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: the master should perform the self-consecration and so forth.

original: de nas rang gi ming nas brjod par byas la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi ming nas brjod par byas la /
translated: Then, having uttered one’s own name,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdo rjer bsgrubs te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdo rjer bsgrubs te /
translated: one should accomplish all maṇḍalas as vajra.

original: de nas bsdu ba byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de bsgo zhing las bya ba dang / bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dbul ba byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgrubs te /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de bsgo zhing las bya ba dang / bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dbul ba byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgrubs te /
translated: Then, having gathered them together, one should perform the rite of the consecration by praising with the one hundred and eight names, and one should perform the rite of exorcising the obstructors, and so forth, and one should offer the water for the feet and the water for the mouth, and having accomplished Vairocana, etc.

original: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
analyzed: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
translated: with the pledge seals, one should seal them with the Dharma, Action, and Great Seal.

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dbang bskur te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dbang bskur te /
translated: Then, with the Vajra Jewel Seal, one should confer empowerment on Vairocana, etc.

original: rdo rje rin po che myu gu don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa nor bu'i rigs thams cad grub pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che myu gu don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa nor bu'i rigs thams cad grub pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: and one should confer the empowerment of the accomplishment of all the jewel-family members, such as the Vajra Jewel Sprout, the Accomplisher of All Aims, etc.

original: de nas phyag bya ba dang / mchod yon phul la /🔽mchod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin @146a * //
analyzed: de nas phyag bya ba dang / mchod yon phul la / mchod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin @146a * //
translated: Then, having made obeisance and offered water for the mouth,🔽one should make offerings to all the Tathagatas, etc.

original: gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
translated: with all the offerings.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin slob ma 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //

translated: This is what is being taught.

translated: Then, meditating throughout the night as before, one will be delighted by all the worlds of Ratnapadma and so forth.

translated: The shape of all the atoms of space means that space is all of that, so the nature of all things in the ten directions is the space of all of that.

original: de la rdul ni rnam mkha' kun gyi rdul gyi tshogs te /
analyzed: de la rdul ni rnam mkha' kun gyi rdul gyi tshogs te /

analyzed: de'i dbyibs can ni nam mkha' kun gyi rdul gyi dbyibs dang lhan cig pa'o //

analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad rdul phya rab ji snyed pa'i tshogs de dang de ni nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs brnyan du bsams nas ;
translated: All the particles of space are the collection of particles, and one should imagine that they are the reflection of Akashagarbha.

original: de nas de dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: de ltar gyur bas ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /

original: nam mkha'i rdul kun gyi rdul gyi dbyibs kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdul kun gyi rdul gyi dbyibs kyi zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: rin chen char 'bebs la sogs pa thams cad grub pa de'i sgrub pa por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and one becomes the adept of all those accomplishments, such as Ratnamegha and so forth.

original: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /🔽snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rin chen char 'bebs dang / de'i rigs nor bu'i mchod pa la sogs pa de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te / snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rin chen char 'bebs dang / de'i rigs nor bu'i mchod pa la sogs pa de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: The meaning of that is taught as follows.🔽As before, one should perform the yoga explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarvārthasiddhi, such as Ratnamegha and the jewel worship of his family, and so forth.

original: phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rin chen char 'bebs @150b sam ;
analyzed: phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rin chen char 'bebs @150b sam ;
translated: Later, one should perform the yoga of Ratnamegha, as explained in the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /🔽de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi sngags kyis rin chen char 'bebs sam /
analyzed: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te / de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi sngags kyis rin chen char 'bebs sam /
translated: One should form the great seal of that type.

original: de'i rigs mdun du sprul la /🔽snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rin chen char 'bebs sam /
analyzed: de'i rigs mdun du sprul la / snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rin chen char 'bebs sam /
translated: Then, with one’s own mantra explained in the doctrine maṇḍala, one should emanate Ratnamegha or that type in front.

original: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /🔽sarbba gu hya dzny'a na sarbba siddhi mma pra ya tstsha h'um /
analyzed: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te / sarbba gu hya dzny'a na sarbba siddhi mma pra ya tstsha h'um /
translated: As before, having performed all the rites of the collection, and so on, one should form the action seal of Ratnamegha or that type explained in the doctrine maṇḍala.🔽One should recite the mantra,

original: zhes brjod cing /🔽bcom ldan 'das rin chen char 'bebs sam /
analyzed: zhes brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das rin chen char 'bebs sam /
translated: “sarva guhya jñāna sarva siddhiṃ me prayaccha hūṃ.”

original: de'i rigs rnam dang lhan cig tu gyur pa nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bsgoms la ji srid du nyin re zhing thun bzhir mngon sum du mthong bar gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //

translated: One should meditate with the Bhagavān Ratnamegha or that type, having become one with him, in the four periods of the day, until one sees him in the four periods of the day.

original: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi tshogs de'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsams te /
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi tshogs de'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsams te /
translated: Then, having contemplated the nature of the collection of atoms of all world-realms,

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi tshogs dang mnyam pa'i rin chen char 'bebs kyi dbyings sam /
translated: one should visualize the rain of jewels equal to the collection of atoms of all world-realms, or the shape of the realm of that [rain of jewels],

original: de'i rigs kyi dbyibs su lhan cig mnyam par sbyor zhing /
analyzed: de'i rigs kyi dbyibs su lhan cig mnyam par sbyor zhing /
translated: in union with the consort,

original: ji srid bdag nyid de'i rang bzhin du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid bdag nyid de'i rang bzhin du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and meditate until one sees one's own nature as that [rain of jewels].

original: de nas rin chen char 'bebs la sogs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rin chen char 'bebs la sogs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, all the accomplishments beginning with the rain of jewels will be attained.

original: de ltar dngos grub kyi bye brag rnam pa nyi shu bstan nas da ni don thams cad grub pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de ltar dngos grub kyi bye brag rnam pa nyi shu bstan nas da ni don thams cad grub pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Thus, having explained the twenty types of accomplishments, now, in order to explain the accomplishments taught in the Dharma maṇḍala of Sarvapavitra, one should perform the deity yoga explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarvapavitra.

original: phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings la /
analyzed: phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings la /
translated: Later, having formed the great seal and so forth as explained in the mandala rite,

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor dang por bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor dang por bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: one should accomplish the first mandala, having sealed the deities of the Dharma mandala with the four seals.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to teach the meaning of that, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then, etc.”

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: “Then” means after the teaching of the gnosis of powers.

original: phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bris pa dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro //🔽ji ltar bri ba'i cho gar phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bris pa dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro // ji ltar bri ba'i cho gar phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams te /
translated: “One should form the great seal just as it is” means in accordance with the drawing.

original: bskal pa bzang po'i bar du phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po'i bar du phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should form the great seal beginning with Vairocana, and so forth, up to the good aeon, just as the characteristics of the great seal are explained in the rite of drawing.

original: dngos grub kyang @151a * //
analyzed: dngos grub kyang @151a * //
translated: “One should accomplish the powers” means

original: de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra ba'i phyag rgya chen po bshad pa de 'dra ba 'dir yang yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra ba'i phyag rgya chen po bshad pa de 'dra ba 'dir yang yin no //
translated: “It is like that” means that this is like the explanation of the great seal in the Vajradhātu doctrine maṇḍala.🔽Then, having bound the vajra gem, one should place it in the manner of the maṇḍala of vajra intuition.

original: de nas rdo rje nor bu bcings la rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis kyis rgyab bskums nas mthe bo gnyis rdo rjer bcings pa 'di ni rdo rje nor bu'i phyag
analyzed: de nas rdo rje nor bu bcings la rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis kyis rgyab bskums nas mthe bo gnyis rdo rjer bcings pa 'di ni rdo rje nor bu'i phyag
translated: The vajra gem seal is formed by bending the two index fingers back from the vajra binding and crossing them behind, with the two thumbs bound in the vajra.

original: rgya'o // 'di bcings nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas rnams su gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: rgya'o // 'di bcings nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas rnams su gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Having bound this, one should place it in the proper places in the manner of the Vajradhātu maṇḍala.

original: de bzhin du nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa nas nor bu'i khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa nas nor bu'i khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, the pledge seal is formed from the gem insignia up to the gem fist.

original: de la rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
translated: Therein, the manner of the maṇḍala of vajra intuition is as follows.

original: skyil mo krung 'dug gan rkyal du //
analyzed: skyil mo krung 'dug gan rkyal du //
translated: Sitting cross-legged, lying on one's back,

original: g-yas gcus de bzhin slar gcus pa //
analyzed: g-yas gcus de bzhin slar gcus pa //
translated: coiled to the right, and likewise coiled to the left,

original: snying gar gnas pa bzhi pa ste //
analyzed: snying gar gnas pa bzhi pa ste //
translated: and placed at the heart, is the fourth.

original: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the mandala of the sign of the gem and so forth.🔽Placed on the forehead, on the back of the head,

original: dpral bar gzhag dang ltag pa dang // phrag par yang ni dgod par bya //
analyzed: dpral bar gzhag dang ltag pa dang // phrag par yang ni dgod par bya //
translated: and also placed on the shoulders,🔽placed in the mouth, at the heart, and the sword,

original: khar gzhag snying gar ral gri dang // snying gar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung //
analyzed: khar gzhag snying gar ral gri dang // snying gar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung //
translated: at the heart, and exhaled from the mouth,

original: spyi bo thod pa khar gzhag pa //
analyzed: spyi bo thod pa khar gzhag pa //
translated: placed on the skull at the crown of the head,

original: mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and likewise in front with the two index fingers bent.🔽This is the mudra of the great seal.

original: lhag ma rnams ni dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The remaining ones should be known as the pledge seals explained in the great mandala.

original: h'um rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: h'um rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Hum is the dharma seal of Vairochana.

original: sa ni rdo rje nor bu ma dang / nor bu'i mtshan ma dang / don thams cad grub pa'i gnas rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sa ni rdo rje nor bu ma dang / nor bu'i mtshan ma dang / don thams cad grub pa'i gnas rnams kyi'o //
translated: Sa is the pledge seal of Vajraratna, the sign of the gem, and the abode of accomplishing all aims.

original: ra ni rin chen rgyal po'i'o //
analyzed: ra ni rin chen rgyal po'i'o //
translated: Ra is the pledge seal of Ratnaraja.

original: yi ge ra ni tsheg drag spangs pa ni rin chen chags pa'i'o //
analyzed: yi ge ra ni tsheg drag spangs pa ni rin chen chags pa'i'o //
translated: The letter ra, devoid of the visarga, is of Ratna-rāga.

original: sa ni rin chen legs pa'i'o //
analyzed: sa ni rin chen legs pa'i'o //
translated: Sa is of Ratna-sādhu.

original: ra ni rin chen spyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje rin chen myu gu ma'i'o //🔽te ni nor bu gzi brjid kyi'o //
analyzed: ra ni rin chen spyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje rin chen myu gu ma'i'o // te ni nor bu gzi brjid kyi'o //
translated: Ra is of Ratna-netra and of all the Tathagatas’ garland consecration and of Vajra-ratna-mukuṭa.🔽Te is of Maṇi-tejas.

original: ke ni nor bu dpal gyi'o //
analyzed: ke ni nor bu dpal gyi'o //
translated: Ke is of Maṇi-śrī.

original: ha ni nor bu bzhad pa'i'o //
analyzed: ha ni nor bu bzhad pa'i'o //
translated: Ha is of Maṇi-hāsa.

original: dam ni nor bu padma dang / gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po dang / rdo rje rin chen padma rnams kyi'o //🔽ti ni rin chen mgon po'i'o //
analyzed: dam ni nor bu padma dang / gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po dang / rdo rje rin chen padma rnams kyi'o // ti ni rin chen mgon po'i'o //
translated: Daṃ is of Maṇi-padma and of the wisdom essence of the generosity samādhi and of Vajra-ratna-padma.🔽Ti is of Ratna-nātha.

original: hi ni nor bu 'khor lo'i'o //
analyzed: hi ni nor bu 'khor lo'i'o //
translated: Hi is of Maṇi-cakra.

original: bha ni nor bu gsung ba'i'o //
analyzed: bha ni nor bu gsung ba'i'o //
translated: Bha is of Maṇi-bhāṣa.

original: ka ni rin chen char 'bebs dang / nor bu'i mchod pa dang / rin chen @151b rgyun ma rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: ka ni rin chen char 'bebs dang / nor bu'i mchod pa dang / rin chen @151b rgyun ma rnams kyi'o //
translated: Ka is of Ratna-varṣa, of Maṇi-pūja, and of Ratna-santati.

original: ra ni nor bu bsrung ba'i'o //
analyzed: ra ni nor bu bsrung ba'i'o //
translated: Ra is of Maṇi-rakṣa.

original: ya ni nor bu gnod sbyin gyi'o //
analyzed: ya ni nor bu gnod sbyin gyi'o //
translated: Ya is of Maṇi-yakṣa.

original: ma ni nor bu khu tshur gyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: ma ni nor bu khu tshur gyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mother is the Dharma mudra of the jewel fist.

original: lhag ma rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa nyid yin no //
translated: The rest are just as they are explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarva­tathāgata­kāya­vāk­citta­vajra­samaya­siddhi.

original: mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni //
analyzed: mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni //
translated: In brief, the action mudra

original: gnas ji bzhin par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas ji bzhin par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: is placed in its proper place.

original: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i nor bu'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i nor bu'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Having formed the pledge mudra of the jewel fist explained in the Dharma maṇḍala of the great jewel family,

original: gnyis su byas nas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams nas rin chen char 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis su byas nas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams nas rin chen char 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: having made two, one should form the mudras beginning with Vairocana and ending with Ratnamegha in the manner explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarva­tathāgata­kāya­vāk­citta­vajra­samaya­siddhi. This is the meaning.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the Dharma maṇḍala of Sarva­tathāgata­kāya­vāk­citta­vajra­samaya­siddhi is complete.

original: // / de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the jewel-family doctrine maṇḍala, which is the doctrine seal that is the principal,

original: da ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa des 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
analyzed: da ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa des 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
translated: now, in order to guide those beings who are to be guided by the action seal that is the principal, [the Bhagavān] teaches the great jewel family’s action maṇḍala.

original: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then the Bhagavān, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste //
translated: The word “then” means immediately after.

original: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: It is immediately after the meditative stabilization called “the first application.”

original: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dang po sbyor ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dang po sbyor ba nyid yin no //
translated: Here, the meditative stabilization called “the first application” is just the first application taught in the great maṇḍala of all-purpose achievement.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na yang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na yang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: “Again” is stated in reference to the great jewel family’s doctrine maṇḍala.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The Bhagavat is Vairochana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The consecration of all Tathagatas is the Bhagavat Vairochana's Great Jewel Karma Mandala.

original: de nyid kyi dam tshig de las byung ba ni rdo rje snying po'i thugs ka'i rdo rje rin po che gang las byung ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi dam tshig de las byung ba ni rdo rje snying po'i thugs ka'i rdo rje rin po che gang las byung ba de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The pledge of that is the great jewel of the heart of Vajra Essence, from which the great jewel of the heart of Vajra Essence is born.

original: des byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas 'di bstan pa ni rang rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs shing bshad pa'o //🔽don thams cad grub pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor de las byung zhing bskyed pa'i las kyi rgyur gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: des byin gyis brlabs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas 'di bstan pa ni rang rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs shing bshad pa'o // don thams cad grub pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor de las byung zhing bskyed pa'i las kyi rgyur gsungs pa'o //
translated: The samadhi blessed by that is the samadhi that he entered and actualized, and this is taught as the highest self-awareness.🔽The Karma Mandala of the Fulfillment of All Aims is said to be the cause of the generation of the family of the fulfillment of all aims.

original: de ltar phyag na rdo rjes don thams cad grub pa'i rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa rig pa @152a * //
analyzed: de ltar phyag na rdo rjes don thams cad grub pa'i rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa rig pa @152a * //
translated: Thus, Vajrapani is said to be the cause of the generation of the family of the fulfillment of all aims.

original: dam pa gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du rdo rje snying pos rin chen spyan gyi rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa dang / rdo rje lta bas rin chen padma'i rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa dang /
analyzed: dam pa gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du rdo rje snying pos rin chen spyan gyi rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa dang / rdo rje lta bas rin chen padma'i rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa dang /
translated: Similarly, Vajra Essence spoke this sublime awareness that became the cause for generating the jewel eye family, and Vajra View spoke this sublime awareness that became the cause for generating the jewel lotus family.

original: rdo rje sna tshogs dang rin chen char 'bebs kyi rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje sna tshogs dang rin chen char 'bebs kyi rigs bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: Vajra Variety and Jewel Rain spoke this sublime awareness that became the cause for generating the jewel variety and jewel rain families.

original: de dag 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che las las thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor sprul nas snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul ba yin par shes par bya'o ;
analyzed: de dag 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che las las thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor sprul nas snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul ba yin par shes par bya'o ;
translated: Those should be understood as having been emanated from the jewel in the heart of Noble Ākāśagarbha, the maṇḍala that is the nature of all activities, and offered to all tathāgatas as before.

original: / de la de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: / de la de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: There, beginning with “Then again the bhagavān,”

original: aom bi shva aa bhi she ka zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di tsam gyis nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan to //
analyzed: aom bi shva aa bhi she ka zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di tsam gyis nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan to //
translated: By just this text, Om Vishva Abhisheka, the second meditative stabilization called the supreme royal activity mandala of the great jewel lineage is revealed.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Then, the gathering and consecration as before is to be understood as the third meditative stabilization called the supreme royal activity of the great jewel lineage.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: Then, then and so forth have been explained.

original: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
translated: Then, what is to be explained and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'o //
translated: is the supreme activity mandala, for the sake of taking care of sentient beings to be disciplined by the activity mandala, immediately following the prior service.

original: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni gtso bo'o //
analyzed: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni gtso bo'o //
translated: The supreme activity mandala of the great jewel lineage is the principal one.

original: rdo rje dbyings ni 'dir sprul pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings ni 'dir sprul pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pas na /
translated: The vajra realm is similar to the emanation karma mandala here.

original: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is similar to the vajra realm.

original: rin chen zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs ba'i mthar thug pa ni rin po che'i rigs so //
analyzed: rin chen zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs ba'i mthar thug pa ni rin po che'i rigs so //
translated: The jewel is from Vairochana up to Ratnapāṇi, which is the jewel family.

original: dgos pa ni rin po che'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa ni rin po che'i dgos pa'o //
translated: The purpose is the purpose of the jewel.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i las ni sangs rgyas mchod pa'i las dang de bshad pa'i grags pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i las ni sangs rgyas mchod pa'i las dang de bshad pa'i grags pa'o //
translated: The activity of fulfilling the wishes of all sentient beings is the activity of worshipping the buddhas and the fame of explaining that.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

analyzed: kha dang rna ba mgo ltag pa // spyi bor phrag pa kha rked gzhag / ces bya ba 'di ni @155b nor bu'i gzugs ma'i dam tshig gi lha mo nas brtsams te /

analyzed: thams cad kyi gnas kun du 'di rnams gzhag par bya'o //

original: ji ltar gzhag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhag par bya zhe na /

original: rdo rje dges pa'i tshul du ni //
analyzed: rdo rje dges pa'i tshul du ni //

analyzed: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du // zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: snying ga'i rtsib logs rgyab sbyor ba //

analyzed: dpral ba la sogs de bzhin du ; / kha dang rna ba mgo ltag pa // spyi bo phrag pa kha rked gzhag / ces bya ba 'di ni //

analyzed: ces bya ba 'di ni // ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya //

analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the pledge seal of the remaining ones is the same as that explained in the Maṇḍala of the Dhāraṇī of the Accomplishment of All Meaning.

analyzed: de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni go sla'o //
translated: The knowledge of the doctrine seal is easy to understand.

analyzed: dza zhes bya ba ni rin chen rgyal po'i lha mo'i'o /
translated: The “ja” is the doctrine seal of the goddess of the jewel-king.

analyzed: dhu zhes bya ba ni rin chen legs pa'i lha mo'i'o // tna zhes bya ba ni rin chen lta ba'am /

translated: The “tan” is the doctrine seal of the goddess of the jewel-seeing or the consecration of the garland of all tathāgatas and the abode of the jewel-sprout.🔽The “ja” is the doctrine seal of the goddess of the jewel-sun.

original: tu zhes bya ba ni rnor bu dpal gyi lha mo'i'o //
analyzed: tu zhes bya ba ni rnor bu dpal gyi lha mo'i'o //
translated: The “tu” is the doctrine seal of the goddess of the jewel-glory.

original: sa zhes bya ba ni rin chen bshad pa'i lha mo'i'o //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni rin chen bshad pa'i lha mo'i'o //
translated: “Sa” is the goddess Explanatory Jewel.

original: tma zhes bya ba ni rin chen padma gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po dang / rin chen padma'i gnas rnams kyi lha mo'i'o //

translated: “Tam” is the concentration of the bestowal of the jewel lotus, the essence of wisdom, and the goddesses of the jewel lotus abodes.

analyzed: kshna zhes bya ba ni rin chen rnon po'i lha mo'i'o //
translated: “Kṣa” is the goddess Sharp Jewel.

original: tu zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i 'khor lo'i'o //
analyzed: tu zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i 'khor lo'i'o //
translated: “Tu” is the jewel wheel.

translated: “Rma” is the goddesses of the jewel rain-shower, jewel worship, and jewel rain-stream abodes.🔽“Kṣa” is the goddess Jewel Protection.

analyzed: kri zhes bya ba ni nor bu gnod sbyin gyi lha mo'i'o //
translated: “Kri” is the goddess Jewel Yakṣa.

original: dhi zhes bya ba ni nor bu khu tshur gyi lha mo'i'o //
analyzed: dhi zhes bya ba ni nor bu khu tshur gyi lha mo'i'o //
translated: “Dhi” is the goddess Jewel Fist.

original: lhag ma ni don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: The rest should be understood as explained in the retention mandala of Sarvarthasiddhi.

original: rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la //
translated: Having made the two vajra jewels,

original: las kyi phyag rgya de bsgrub po //🔽zhes bya ba ni nor bu khu tshur gyi gnas su bzhad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya gnyis su byas na rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i las kyi phyag rgya ste /

translated: one accomplishes the karma-mudra.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that if one makes the two vajra-jewel mudras of the abode of the fist of the jewel, the karma-mudra of Vairochana up to Ratnapāṇi is bound in the manner explained in the great mandala of Sarvarthasiddhi.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the karma-mandala of Sarvarthasiddhi is complete.

original: // / de ltar nor bu chen po'i rigs kyis 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po la dga' ba'i sems can gyi khams las brtsams nas ni /
analyzed: // / de ltar nor bu chen po'i rigs kyis 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po la dga' ba'i sems can gyi khams las brtsams nas ni /

analyzed: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam bzhis phyag rgya chen po bstan nas /

translated: now, beginning with the realm of sentient beings who are frightened by the vast and who delight in the middling, [the Bhagavān] declares the great jewel family’s four-seal maṇḍala, which is the collection of all the accomplishments of one’s own family.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

analyzed: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid yin no //
translated: Here, the first-application-sādhana-samādhi is just the first-application-sādhana-samādhi explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarva-tathāgata-kāya-vāk-citta-vajrāgrya-siddhi.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The Bhagavān is Vairocana.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i thugs ka'i zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i rin chen phyag rgya de la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i thugs ka'i zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i rin chen phyag rgya de la dmigs pa'o //
translated: The jewel seal of the jewel in the moon at the heart of Sarvarthasiddhi is the focus.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas so //
translated: Having entered into and actualized the samadhi called Jewel Seal,

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'o //
translated: this refers to what is in the mind.

original: rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: This sublime knowledge is spoken, explained.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi gzugs can rang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sbrul @156b pa'i phyir don thams cad grub pa'i thugs kun gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i rnam pa thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas rig pa
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi gzugs can rang gi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor sbrul @156b pa'i phyir don thams cad grub pa'i thugs kun gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i rnam pa thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas rig pa
translated: with his mind one-pointed on the aspect of the jewel at the heart of Sarvarthasiddhi, the abode of all meanings, in order to emanate the mandala of his own four seals,

original: dam pa 'di gsungs pas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la bskul ba dang / de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi thugs ga na ka nas pa'i rdo rje rin po che las dkyil 'khor sbrul nas /

translated: Then, from the heart of Noble Ākāshagarbha, a vajra-jewel was emanated, and from that a maṇḍala was emanated.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snga ma bzhin du phul lo zhes bya'o //

translated: Thus, first of all, the maṇḍala of the four seals of Vairochana, having the form of a jewel, should be drawn.🔽Then, since Vajrapāṇi spoke this seal of his, it becomes the maṇḍala of the four seals of Sarvasādhana.

original: de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs pas rin chen lta ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs pas rin chen lta ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, since Vajra-garbha spoke this seal of his, it becomes the maṇḍala of the four seals of Ratnāvaloka.

original: de nas rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs pas rin chen padma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro//
analyzed: de nas rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs pas rin chen padma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro//
translated: Then Vajra Eye uttered this mantra of his own seal, which becomes the four-seal mandala of Jewel Lotus:

translated: Vajra Variety uttered this mantra of his own seal, which emanates the four-seal seal of Jewel Rain from the jewel-vajra at his heart,🔽and offers it to all the tathagatas as before.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du phul ba yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga po gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du phul ba yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga po gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This much text teaches the five samadhis called the great four-seal mandala king of the great jewel family.

original: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya chen po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga po gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya chen po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga po gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Then the five samadhis called the great action seal are taught, such as the gathering, consecration, and so forth.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The meaning of the passage from the Sarvakamadhenu chapter is that the powers are to be accomplished by means of the pledges and initiation in the four seal mandala of Sarvarthasiddhi.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The passage beginning with “then” teaches this meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'i brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'i brjod pa ste /
translated: “Then” means immediately after the statement,

original: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /🔽don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas don thams cad grub pa'i rnal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas te /

translated: This is what is being taught.🔽Having performed the yoga of Sarvarthasiddhi and the great yoga explained in that [Tantra],

original: de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i @157a * //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i @157a * //
translated: then, by the rite explained in the great mandala of Sarvarthasiddhi, one should accomplish the four seals of Sarvarthasiddhi.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum nas brtsams te nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam lo gcig gi bar du ji srid mngon sum lta bur mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum nas brtsams te nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam lo gcig gi bar du ji srid mngon sum lta bur mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Beginning with the three meditative stabilizations, one should meditate for one month, or six months, or one year, in four sessions each day, for as long as one sees as if in actuality.

original: rjes su gnang ba thob nas rang gi dkyil 'khor bri'o zhes gsungs pas na de nas de'i rjes thogs la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su gnang ba thob nas rang gi dkyil 'khor bri'o zhes gsungs pas na de nas de'i rjes thogs la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
translated: Since it is said that having obtained permission, one should draw one's own maṇḍala, then after that, immediately following that, one should draw this maṇḍala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ston pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ston pa ste /
translated: Then indicates the reason.

original: gang gi phyir phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na bar ma la dga' ba'i sems can gyi don rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na bar ma la dga' ba'i sems can gyi don rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o //
translated: Since, if one does not enter the maṇḍala of the four seals, the welfare of sentient beings who delight in the intermediate will not be accomplished, therefore, it should be fully explained.

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala of the four seals.

original: dam pa ni gtso bor gyur pa ste /
analyzed: dam pa ni gtso bor gyur pa ste /
translated: Supreme means principal.

original: dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig tu gyur pa na rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor las dam par gyur pa'i phyir /🔽phyag rgya bzhi yi tshul du na //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig tu gyur pa na rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor las dam par gyur pa'i phyir / phyag rgya bzhi yi tshul du na //
translated: Since it is the commitment of all powers, it is the most excellent of all mandala-s of the families.

original: dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya //
translated: The mandala should be constructed in the manner of the four seals.

original: zhes bya'o // don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa bzhin du phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor bris nas /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa bzhin du phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor bris nas /
translated: Having drawn the outer and inner mandala-s in accordance with the explanation in the Great Maṇḍala of Sarvapavitra-siddhi,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i dbus su don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i gdan dang / sku mdog dang / dbyibs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i dbus su don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i gdan dang / sku mdog dang / dbyibs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad bri bar bya'o //
translated: in the center of the mandala, one should draw Vairocana endowed with the seat, color, shape, etc. explained in the Great Maṇḍala of Sarvapavitra-siddhi.🔽This knowledge-mantra of his is:

original: aom badzra ratna ne tre zhes bya ba 'di'i rig pa 'di'am /
analyzed: aom badzra ratna ne tre zhes bya ba 'di'i rig pa 'di'am /
translated: Oṃ vajra ratna netre.

original: aom pu he ratna h'um zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: aom pu he ratna h'um zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or this one: Oṃ pu hu ratna hūṃ.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i gnas su padma dang zla ba'i steng du /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i gnas su padma dang zla ba'i steng du /
translated: In the place of Sarvapavitra-siddhi, on a lotus and moon,

original: aom badzra ma ni h'um zhes bya bas ni rdo rje nor bu'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ma ni h'um zhes bya bas ni rdo rje nor bu'o //
translated: With “Oṃ vajra maṇi hūṃ” is the vajra jewel.

original: rin chen lta ba'i gnas su /🔽aom badzra ratna aam ku ra h'um /
analyzed: rin chen lta ba'i gnas su / aom badzra ratna aam ku ra h'um /
translated: In the place of the jewel gaze,

original: zhes bya bas rdo rje rin chen myu gu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas rdo rje rin chen myu gu'o //
translated: with “Oṃ vajra ratna aṅkura hūṃ” is the vajra jewel sprout.

original: rin chen padma'i gnas su /🔽aom badzra ratna padma h'um /
analyzed: rin chen padma'i gnas su / aom badzra ratna padma h'um /
translated: In the place of the jewel lotus,

original: zhes bya bas rin chen padma'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas rin chen padma'o //
translated: with “Oṃ vajra ratna padma hūṃ” is the jewel lotus.

original: rin chen char 'bebs kyi gnas su /🔽aom ratna barsha h'um /
analyzed: rin chen char 'bebs kyi gnas su / aom ratna barsha h'um /
translated: In the place of the jewel rainmaker,

original: zhes bya bas rin chen char 'bebs kyi'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas rin chen char 'bebs kyi'o //
translated: with “Oṃ ratna varṣa hūṃ” is the jewel rainmaker.

original: zla ba dang padma'i steng du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can bris la /
analyzed: zla ba dang padma'i steng du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can bris la /
translated: On a moon and lotus, draw the characteristics as explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarva­nīvaraṇa­viṣkambhin.

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine the maṇḍala with the method of the four seals.

original: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste bslab par bya'o //
translated: Then, having properly admitted the disciple, one should teach it.

original: khyod kyis su la yang ma smra cig ces bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshogs slob dpon rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: khyod kyis su la yang ma smra cig ces bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshogs slob dpon rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
translated: One should perform the ritual of the master's own entrance into the mandala as explained in the Great Mandala of Sarva-Tathāgata-Artha-Siddhi.🔽 One should perform the self-consecration, etc.,

analyzed: bdag la @157b byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang / rang gi ming nas brjod cing dkyil 'khor rdo rje bsgrubs la /
translated: and having accomplished the vajra of the mandala by reciting one's own name,

original: bsdu ba la sogs pa byas te mchod pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mchod la phyag byas te zhugs nas gnang ba nod par bya'o //
