translated: having performed the gathering, etc., having made offerings to all the deities of the mandala in the proper way, having bowed down, one should request permission to enter.

original: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rin po che'i slob ma bcug ste /
analyzed: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rin po che'i slob ma bcug ste /
translated: Then, having caused the precious disciple to enter by the rite as explained in the Great Mandala of Sarva-Tathāgata-Artha-Siddhi,

original: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: one should perform all the rites.

original: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni gzhung 'dis gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni gzhung 'dis gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The extensive rite of the master's actions and the rite of the disciple's entrance are taught in this text.

original: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /🔽da ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa /
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas / da ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa /
translated: Having thus taught the extensive ritual of the master's acts and the ritual of inducting the disciples,

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams slob dpon gyis bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams slob dpon gyis bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the meaning of the master should explain the powers spoken of in the chapter of the accomplishment of all aims to those who have obtained the initiation and the commitments in the mandala of the four seals of the great jewel family,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares thereupon, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
translated: Thereupon means after the teaching of the ritual of inducting the disciples.

original: ye shes bskyed par bya ste zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen sgrub pa'i man ngag yin pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes bskyed par bya ste zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen sgrub pa'i man ngag yin pas shes par bya'o //
translated: One should generate the intuition means one should understand the esoteric instruction for accomplishing the vajra jewel.

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje rin chen te ;
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje rin chen te ;
translated: The vajra jewel is the wish-granting jewel marked with a five-pronged vajra.

original: de bsgrub cing sprul par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bsgrub cing sprul par byed pa'o //
translated: One should accomplish and emanate that.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis so //
translated: By the vajra-jewel meditative stabilization.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to //🔽rdo rje rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin gang du bya zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to // rdo rje rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin gang du bya zhe na /
translated: The vajra-jewel meditative stabilization is the single-pointed mind of the form of a vajra-jewel.

original: dpral bar rab tu bzhag na ni //
analyzed: dpral bar rab tu bzhag na ni //
translated: Where is the vajra-jewel meditative stabilization to be placed?

original: zhes bya ba smos te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te ;
translated: It is said:🔽Placed on the forehead.

original: dpral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge tras sprul la gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: dpral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge tras sprul la gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The letter tra is emanated above the circle of the forehead and placed there.

original: de ltar gyur pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is to be done by its being there?🔽It is said:

original: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: All powers are attained.

original: dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the power of consecration is attained.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i de 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i de 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Having performed the yoga of the deity that one desires according to the Great Maṇḍala of All-Powerful Deeds,

original: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas te /
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas te /
translated: having made offerings with all offerings, having made obeisance,

original: lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya de las bshad pa bcings te /
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya de las bshad pa bcings te /
translated: Having formed that seal of all the deities,

original: rang gi dpral ba'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du @158a * //
analyzed: rang gi dpral ba'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du @158a * //
translated: one should emanate from the syllable tra on a moon disc on one's forehead

original: yi ge tra las rdo rje rin po che ga ser gyi mdog can sprul la /
analyzed: yi ge tra las rdo rje rin po che ga ser gyi mdog can sprul la /
translated: a yellow vajra-jewel, the color of gorochana.🔽One should recite this essence mantra:

original: aom badzra ratna aa bhi she ka sarbba siddhi yo me pra yatstshar lar la h'um tra /
analyzed: aom badzra ratna aa bhi she ka sarbba siddhi yo me pra yatstshar lar la h'um tra /
translated: Om, Vajra-Jewel, bestow consecration, grant me all accomplishments, tral lar hum tra.

original: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di brjod cing nyin re bzhin du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di brjod cing nyin re bzhin du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bya'o //
translated: One should practice in four sessions every day until one sees it in actuality.

original: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na 'dod pa'i lha'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na 'dod pa'i lha'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, on the full moon, if one meditates throughout the night, one will obtain the accomplishment of the desired deity.

original: de nas de'i rjes la mnyam par sbyor ba gsang ba'i bsgom pa'i ngo bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //🔽khyo'am yang na sdug pa'am //
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes la mnyam par sbyor ba gsang ba'i bsgom pa'i ngo bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //🔽khyo'am yang na sdug pa'am //
translated: Then, after that, one should teach the knowledge of the seal, the essence of the secret meditation of union.

original: bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung ;
analyzed: bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung ;
translated: Whether a woman or a man,🔽the two foreheads should be joined,

original: / dpral ba gnyis ni sbyar ba dang // sprad pas gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / dpral ba gnyis ni sbyar ba dang // sprad pas gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and by the union both will be successful.

original: de la khyo ni don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i skyes bu'o //
analyzed: de la khyo ni don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i skyes bu'o //
translated: In this regard, the husband is the person who is the Accomplisher of All Aims, and so forth.

original: sdug pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gzungs kyi lha mo ste /
analyzed: sdug pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gzungs kyi lha mo ste /
translated: The beloved is the spell goddess explained in the Action Tantra mandala,

original: rig pa'i lha mo rin chen phreng ba ma la sogs pa dang / mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad do //🔽de ltar khyo de'i gzugs sam /
analyzed: rig pa'i lha mo rin chen phreng ba ma la sogs pa dang / mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad do // de ltar khyo de'i gzugs sam /
translated: the knowledge goddess such as Ratnamala, and all the offering goddesses.

original: sdug pa'i gzugs su ji lta bar bshad pa de gal te 'ga' zhig sgrub par 'dod na skyes pa'am /🔽bud med dam /
analyzed: sdug pa'i gzugs su ji lta bar bshad pa de gal te 'ga' zhig sgrub par 'dod na skyes pa'am / bud med dam /
translated: If one wishes to accomplish that form of the husband or the form of the beloved as explained, whether a man or a woman,

original: khyo'am / sdug pa'i dpral ba dang rang gi dpral ba gnyis sbyar nas dpral ba gnyis mi phyed par bya'o //
analyzed: khyo'am / sdug pa'i dpral ba dang rang gi dpral ba gnyis sbyar nas dpral ba gnyis mi phyed par bya'o //
translated: the husband or the beloved should join the two foreheads, and the two foreheads should be made inseparable.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽sprad pas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / sprad pas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: How?🔽It is said, “by the union.”

original: yang dag par sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is “by the correct union.”

original: ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What will happen?

original: skyes pa dang bud med 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes pa dang bud med 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Men and women will be accomplished.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: gal te bud med gang zhig bcom ldan 'das sam gzhan gang yang rung ba'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po khyo sgrub par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te bud med gang zhig bcom ldan 'das sam gzhan gang yang rung ba'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po khyo sgrub par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: If a woman desires to accomplish the Bhagavān or any other Ārya Ākāśagarbha as her husband,

original: des don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje nor bu ma la sogs pa rig pa'i lha mo'i rnal 'byor byas te /
analyzed: des don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje nor bu ma la sogs pa rig pa'i lha mo'i rnal 'byor byas te /
translated: then at that time she should perform the yoga of the knowledge goddess such as Vajraratna, as explained in the great maṇḍala of Sarvārthasiddhi.

original: phyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'am gzhan gang yang rung ba mdun du sprul la /
analyzed: phyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'am gzhan gang yang rung ba mdun du sprul la /
translated: Subsequently, she should emanate Ārya Ākāśagarbha or any other in front of her.

original: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
analyzed: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
translated: She should perform all the rites such as the gathering,

original: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
translated: and make perfect offerings with all offerings.

original: de nas gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig pa'i lha mo'i phyag rgya yang dag par bcings te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig pa'i lha mo'i phyag rgya yang dag par bcings te /
translated: Then, binding the mudrā of any other knowledge goddess,

original: des bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyar bar bsgoms la /
analyzed: des bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyar bar bsgoms la /
translated: she should meditate on union with the Bhagavān.

original: aom badzra ratna sa @158b khyi ba dhi dha ratvam pra yatstsha sh'i ghram aa bhi shinytsa hi ha ha ha tra zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ratna sa @158b khyi ba dhi dha ratvam pra yatstsha sh'i ghram aa bhi shinytsa hi ha ha ha tra zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should say, Om vajra ratna saṃbhava dharmaratna pra-yaccha śrīghana abhiṣiñca hi hi hi hi tra.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms na bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dang des lhan cig mnyam par sbyar ba byas na rang gi chung ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms na bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dang des lhan cig mnyam par sbyar ba byas na rang gi chung ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, as before, one should meditate throughout the night. If one does so, one will become like the wife of Bhagavat Ākāśagarbha, and one will be united with him.

original: skyes pa nyid yin na sbyor ba 'dis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i lha mo mdun du gzhab la bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes pa nyid yin na sbyor ba 'dis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i lha mo mdun du gzhab la bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: If one is a man, one should practice in front of the goddess Ākāśagarbha, using this method.

original: de ltar gsang ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyag rgya bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar gsang ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyag rgya bstan nas /
translated: Thus the secret gnosis-mudra has been taught.

original: da ni don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba
analyzed: da ni don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba
translated: Now, in order to teach the meaning “one should accomplish the powers explained in the chapter on the accomplishment of all means by means of the yoga of one’s deity explained in the great maṇḍala of the accomplishment of all means,”

original: la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the root text says “then,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni nor bu chen po'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni nor bu chen po'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste /

translated: Having placed the dhāraṇīs from the precious jewel to the rain of jewels in their respective places, one should recite the three essences as before.

original: badzra a'atma ko zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsum bsgoms nas rin chen gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed de /
analyzed: badzra a'atma ko zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsum bsgoms nas rin chen gsang ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed de /
translated: Having meditated on the three topics such as vajra ātmā ko, one should generate the pride that one is the nature of the maṇḍala of the dhāraṇī of the jewel secret.

original: de nyid nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas gzungs kyi rig pa thams cad re re zhing khri khri bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas gzungs kyi rig pa thams cad re re zhing khri khri bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should repeat each of all the dhāraṇī awarenesses one hundred thousand times in each of the four sessions every day.

original: phyis zhag bdun gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms te ;
analyzed: phyis zhag bdun gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms te ;
translated: Later, for seven days, one should meditate on the three meditative stabilizations of the dhāraṇī maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor bris na de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bris na de ltar gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one draws the maṇḍala, one will accomplish the dhāraṇī maṇḍala.

original: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pas snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor byas nas /
analyzed: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pas snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor byas nas /
translated: Then, having performed the yoga as before by accomplishing the dharma maṇḍala,

original: de bzhin du rig pa rnam pa lngas rang gi snying gar nor bu rin po che'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rig pa rnam pa lngas rang gi snying gar nor bu rin po che'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
translated: Likewise, one should emanate the doctrine mandala of the jewel family at one's heart with the five aspects of awareness.

original: rang gi snying ga nas sna'i khung bu nas drangs te sna'i rtse mor bkod la /🔽chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: rang gi snying ga nas sna'i khung bu nas drangs te sna'i rtse mor bkod la / chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams nas /
translated: Then, one should draw it out from one's heart through the nostrils and arrange it at the tip of the nose.

original: nor bu 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa rnams la bkod la /
analyzed: nor bu 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa rnams la bkod la /
translated: Then, one should arrange the deities of the doctrine mandala, beginning with Vairocana and ending with Nivarana-viskambhin, with the mantra of the doctrine mandala.

original: badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don rnam pa gsum snga ma bzhin du bsgoms te /
analyzed: badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don rnam pa gsum snga ma bzhin du bsgoms te /
translated: Then, one should meditate on the three topics, beginning with vajra-atmako 'ham, as before.

original: ratna dzny'a na sva bh'a ba aa hom svom yom zhes bya bas nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nga rgyal bskyed de /
analyzed: ratna dzny'a na sva bh'a ba aa hom svom yom zhes bya bas nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nga rgyal bskyed de /
translated: Then, one should generate the pride of the doctrine mandala of the jewel family with ratna-jñana-svahavam aham.

original: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te ;
analyzed: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te ;
translated: Then, one should form the great seal of all the deities of the doctrine mandala and recite the mantra.

original: de'i sngags brjod cing nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gnyis bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i sngags brjod cing nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gnyis bsgoms te /
translated: Reciting his mantra, one should meditate for two months in four sessions each day.

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig bsgoms la /
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig bsgoms la /
translated: One should meditate for one month with the yoga of emanating and gathering.

original: de nas zhag bdun chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas zhag bdun chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then for seven days one should meditate on the three aspects of meditative stabilization of the Dharma maṇḍala.

original: de nas bris pa de lta bu chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas bris pa de lta bu chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then that Dharma maṇḍala will be accomplished.

original: lhag ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa bzhin du 'dir yang bsgrub par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa bzhin du 'dir yang bsgrub par shes par bya'o //
translated: The rest should be known to be accomplished here in the same way as explained in the Vajradhātu Dharma maṇḍala.

original: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'dod pas snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'dod pas snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: Then, one who wishes to accomplish the Action maṇḍala should perform the great yoga as before.

original: nor bus mtshan pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bzung nas /
analyzed: nor bus mtshan pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bzung nas /
translated: Seizing the vajra marked with a jewel,🔽one should recite this mantra:🔽“Today, I confer upon you

original: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
translated: In order to fully accomplish all buddhas,

original: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
analyzed: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //

translated: Then the mudra is this:🔽Form the two vajra-fists,

original: mdzub mos mthe chung bsnol ba ni //

analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcing ba dang / rnam pa gzhan de bzhin du bslab par bya'o //

analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

analyzed: chen po bcing ba'i mtshan nyid dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang / las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i mtshan nyid bslab par bya'o //
translated: and in the characteristics of binding the pledge seal, the doctrine seal, and the action seal.

original: dngos grub thams cad 'di bzhin no //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad 'di bzhin no //
translated: All powers are like this.

original: zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / gzungs dang / chos dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dngos grub bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang 'byung ba yin no zhes bstan par bya'o //

translated: This teaches that just as the powers of the great maṇḍala of Sarva­tathāgata­kāya­vāk­citta­ratna, and the maṇḍalas of the dhāraṇī, Dharma, and action, are explained, so too they occur here.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so /
translated: The maṇḍala of the four seals of the blessed Vairocana’s great jewel family is complete.

original: // / de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub par byed par shes par bya'o //

translated: Thus, just as the maṇḍala of the four seals of the blessed Vairocana, so too one should understand the accomplishment of all powers such as the accomplishment of all aims.

original: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad bris nas /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad bris nas /
translated: Having drawn all the outer and inner maṇḍalas just like the great maṇḍala of the accomplishment of all aims,

original: dbus su bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa /🔽aom badzra ratna m'a le h'um zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: dbus su bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa / aom badzra ratna m'a le h'um zhes bya ba'am /
translated: In the center, the Blessed One Sarvarthasiddha.🔽With the essence mantra “Oṃ vajraratnamāle hūṃ”

original: yang aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra d'a h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra d'a h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //

analyzed: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i gnas su padma dang zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du nor bu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya /
translated: Then, in the place of Sarvarthasiddha, on a seat of lotus and moon, the jewel insignia mudrā.

original: aom badzra ma ni tsint'a a'a k'a sha garbha bha ga w'an siddhya siddhya h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ma ni tsint'a a'a k'a sha garbha bha ga w'an siddhya siddhya h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri bar bya'o //
translated: With the essence mantra “Oṃ vajramani cintā ākaśagarbhavāgīśvara siddhya siddhya hūṃ.”

original: rin chen lta ba'i gnas su rin chen rgyal po'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya /
analyzed: rin chen lta ba'i gnas su rin chen rgyal po'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya /
translated: In the place of Ratnaketu, the jewel king insignia mudrā.

original: aom ratna aam ku sha ya sarbba aarth'a n'a ma na ya sh'i ghram sarbba ta th'a ga tya satyam ma nu sma ra h'um /🔽zhes bya ba 'dis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom ratna aam ku sha ya sarbba aarth'a n'a ma na ya sh'i ghram sarbba ta th'a ga tya satyam ma nu sma ra h'um / zhes bya ba 'dis bri bar bya'o //
translated: With the mantra “Oṃ ratnam aṅkuśaya sarvārthānāmanaya śṛṅkhatra sarvatathāgatasatyamanusmara hūṃ.”

original: rin chen lta ba'i gnas su nor bu chags pa'i phyag rgya ni ;
analyzed: rin chen lta ba'i gnas su nor bu chags pa'i phyag rgya ni ;
translated: In the place of Ratnaketu, the jewel passion mudrā.

original: aom aa nu r'a ga ba shi ku ru sarbba aarbb'a n'a ma na ya a'a k'a sha garbha h'um zhes bya ba 'dis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom aa nu r'a ga ba shi ku ru sarbba aarbb'a n'a ma na ya a'a k'a sha garbha h'um zhes bya ba 'dis bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should write with this mantra: Om, cause the passion of all the women to be destroyed, O Akashagarbha, hum!

original: nor bu padma'i gnas su nor bu legs pa'i phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: nor bu padma'i gnas su nor bu legs pa'i phyag rgya ni /
translated: In the place of the jewel and lotus, the jewel mudra of good hands

analyzed: aom ratna h'um shi ham zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri'o //
translated: is written with this essence mantra: Om, jewel hum!

original: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the mandala of the accomplishment of all aims.

original: snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas nas dbus su bcom ldan 'das rin chen lta ba /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas nas dbus su bcom ldan 'das rin chen lta ba /

original: aom ratna dri shya tram zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di'am /
analyzed: aom ratna dri shya tram zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di'am /
translated: with this essence mantra: Om, I see the jewel, tram!

original: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i snying pos bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i snying pos bri bar bya'o //
translated: or with the essence mantra of the four mudras.

original: don thams cad grub pa'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: don thams cad grub pa'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya ni /

analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she k'a m'a la h'um zhes bya ba 'dis @161b bri bar bya'o //
